模块 SokobanGame
程序包 element

类 MusicPlayer

java.lang.Object
element.MusicPlayer
public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
I choose a lazy singleton pattern for the MusicPlayer class that is because in one game, there is only one Music player can play the background music
从以下版本开始:
2.0
作者:
Zhengtian CHU

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void CreatePlayer()
    Create a music player
    static MusicPlayer getInstance()  
    boolean IsPlayingMusic()
    Judge whether the music is played.
    void PlayMusic()
    Play the background music of the game.
    void SetPlayer​(javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer player)  
    void StopMusic()
    Let the background music of the game stopped.

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • 方法详细资料

    • getInstance

      public static MusicPlayer getInstance()

    • SetPlayer

      public void SetPlayer​(javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer player)

    • CreatePlayer

      public void CreatePlayer() throws javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
      Create a music player
      抛出:
      javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - cannot find the music file

    • PlayMusic

      public void PlayMusic()
      Play the background music of the game.

    • StopMusic

      public void StopMusic()
      Let the background music of the game stopped.

    • IsPlayingMusic

      public boolean IsPlayingMusic()
      Judge whether the music is played.
      返回:
      if the music is played, return true, otherwise return false
